example_sentences.jap_sentence: 新しく赴任して来た教師

example_sentences.eng_trans: My first assignment was the branch office in Kofu.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 最初に赴任したのは甲府の支店でした

example_sentences.eng_trans: He was assigned to Sapporo and lives there apart from his family.
example_sentences.jap_sentence: 彼は札幌に単身赴任している

example_sentences.eng_trans: one's new post; the place of one's assignment
